title: All sounds from client started to pop and skip.

replies.body: Are there any specific things that happen or steps that you take before that occurs? If you play music, or any sound, from another app, does it also skip?
It seems to start here https://www.twitch.tv/therabidwarmogs/v/100165909?t=03h38m00s but I don't see anything unusual.
Nope. Listening to music via YouTube and streaming but it's not skipping at the moment. I'll take a look at my VoD and see when it started and if anything seems to of caused it.

I already sent in a bug report during last patch about this same thing (though I didn't do video), and it only seems to do this when the client has stayed open for a long time. This happens basically everytime you leave the client open a long time.
